Package com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bucket
    Created by fonso on 6/28/16.
    Facet
    Abstract class to be implemented by the specific facet query classes Facet.TermFacet, Facet.NumericRangeFacet, Facet.DateRangeFacet, Facet.PivotFacet, Facet.QueryFacet and Facet.StatsFacet.
    Facet.DateIntervalFacet<T>  
    Facet.DateIntervalFacet.UtilDateIntervalFacet<T extends Date>  
    Facet.DateIntervalFacet.UtilDateMathIntervalFacet<T extends Date>  
    Facet.DateIntervalFacet.ZoneDateTimeDateMathIntervalFacet<T extends ZonedDateTime>  
    Facet.DateIntervalFacet.ZoneDateTimeIntervalFacet<T extends ZonedDateTime>  
    Facet.DateRangeFacet<T>
    This abstract class provides the foundations to be implemented by date type specific classes in order to perform ranged facet query on a date field.
    Facet.DateRangeFacet.DateMathRangeFacet<T extends DateMathExpression>
    Class which allows to perform ranged facet query on a DateMathExpression typed date field.
    Facet.DateRangeFacet.UtilDateRangeFacet<T extends Date>
    Class which allows to perform ranged facet query on a Date typed date field.
    Facet.DateRangeFacet.ZoneDateRangeFacet<T extends ZonedDateTime>
    Class which allows to perform ranged facet query on a ZonedDateTime typed date field.
    Facet.IntervalFacet<T>  
    Facet.NumericIntervalFacet<T extends Number>  
    Facet.NumericRangeFacet<T extends Number>
    This class allows to perform ranged facet query on a numeric field.
    Facet.PivotFacet
    Allows to configure basic pivot facet queries on a group of fields.
    Facet.QueryFacet
    Allows to configure a query facet.
    Facet.StatsDateFacet<T extends ZonedDateTime>
    Allows to configure a date stats facet query.
    Facet.StatsFacet<T>
    Allows to configure a basic stats facet query.
    Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T extends Number>
    Allows to configure a numeric stats facet query.
    Facet.StatsUtilDateFacet<T extends Date>
    Allows to configure a date stats facet query.
    Facet.SubdocumentFacet
    This class allows to perform a subdocument faceting based on document type.
    Facet.TermFacet<T>
    This class allows to perform the basic term facet query on one field.
    Facet.TypeFacet
    This class allows to perform a basic faceting based on document type.
    Facets
    Utility class offering static user friendly methods to create intuitively facets for a search query.
    Interval<T>  
    Interval.DateMathInterval<T extends DateMathExpression>  
    Interval.DateMathInterval.UtilDateDateMathInterval<T extends Date>  
    Interval.DateMathInterval.ZoneDateTimeDateMathInterval<T extends ZonedDateTime>  
    Interval.NumericInterval<T extends Number>  
    Interval.UtilDateInterval<T extends Date>  
    Interval.ZonedDateTimeInterval<T extends ZonedDateTime>
